00019 #ifndef __COMMANDSIGNATURE__

00022 #include "CommandMisc.h"

00024 class wxString;
00025 class wxVariant;
00026 class Validator;
00027 
00028 class CommandSignature
00029 {
00030 private:
00031    ParamValueMap mDefaults;
00032    ValidatorMap mValidators;
00033    explicit CommandSignature(const CommandSignature &other) { }
00034 public:
00035    explicit CommandSignature() { }
00036    ~CommandSignature();
00037 
00038    // Add a parameter to the signature.
00039    //    name:  the parameter name (case-sensitive)
00040    //    dft:   a default value
00041    //    valid: a suitable validator (caller doesn't need to delete it)
00042    void AddParameter(const wxString &name,
00043                      const wxVariant &dft,
00044                      Validator *valid);
00045 
00046    // Methods for accessing the signature
00047    ParamValueMap GetDefaults() const;
00048    Validator &GetValidator(const wxString &paramName);
00049 };
